metadata.name: Ghostly Tides
metadata.description: In the days of swashbuckling, seafaring pirates two boys seek to sail the high seas under the banner of the rouge sea rovers! Unfortunately neither boy measures up to the task and so they enlist the help of a witch! As all witchery related things go, nothing turns out quite as planned and the boys find themselves island hopping as the dead rise and living pirates cross swords with their departed brethren!
